title: Rapper Q-Tip’s Contemporary Art Collection on Public Exhibition for First Time
text:
Nina Chanel Abney's untitled work created in 2014 will highlight Q-Tip: The Collection at Bonhams. Courtesy of Bonhams

Text size

Rapper and record producer Q-Tip has personally curated a collection of contemporary art to exhibit, which will showcase his interests and patronage, at Bonhams in New York from Sept. 20 to Oct. 4.

Q-Tip, 49, a member of groundbreaking American hip-hop collective A Tribe Called Quest, selected 13 pieces from his collection, many of which were acquired directly from artists as a result of his strong personal relationships within the creative industries, Bonhams said.

“It is a privilege to have the opportunity to showcase and recognize some of the most talented artists that have inspired me personally and professionally,” Q-Tip said in a statement through Bonhams.
description: The collection has a specific focus on younger, emerging artists
